Hi everyone!
We have to choose the name for the paid version of Cheeky Chuck (which basically includes more music, more animations, more cheeky behaviours, and the new "punch mode"!).
The English name will be "Cheeky Chuck Champ".

I'm sending you a few name options.
Each of you, please let me know which name you prefer (max 2 choices!)

奇奇咔咔无敌版

Thanks, cheers!!
